sentences.sContent: In the early 1990’s an extreme form of isolation emerged, where young Japanese people seclude themselves in their homes for months or even years at a time.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the early 1990’s an extreme form of isolation emerged, where young Japanese people seclude themselves in their homes for months or even years at a time.
sentences.sCn: 早在20世纪90年代初的时候，日本出现了一种极端的孤独症状，患有此症状的日本青年人一度成年累月地把自己隔离在家中。

remMethod.val: se(分开) + clude(关闭) → 分开关闭 → 使隔离， 使孤立

trans.tranOther: to remove from contact with others
